functions.tag: {CustomModelData:7,EntityTag:{Tags:[Sign,Spruce],Silent:1b,Size:0b,DeathLootTable:"item:item/magma_cube_spawn_egg/sign/harvest_wheat",ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:stone",Count:1b,tag:{Data:{Text3:'{"text":"H","font":"sign","color":"white"}',Text4:'{"text":"⑦","font":"sign","color":"white","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"function item:sign/click/harvest_wheat"}}}'}}},{},{},{}]},display:{Name:'{"translate":"収穫の印板（麦）","color":"#FFED75","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"translate":"設置してクリックすると","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"translate":"メインハンドのアイテムで","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"translate":"けっこうな範囲の%1$sを収穫する。","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false,"with":[{"translate":"item.minecraft.wheat","color":"#E8D080"}]}','{"translate":"%1$sが余れば自動で植え付けもする。","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false,"with":[{"translate":"item.minecraft.wheat_seeds","color":"#00E800"}]}','{"translate":"【注意】スポナーには直接設置できません！","color":"#FF0000","bold":true,"italic":false}']}}
